comment: Worst math class I have EVER taken. I am usually pretty good at math but I will be lucky to pass this class. He is so unclear about what is going to be on the test and tries to trick you. Homework every single night. He is rude when you ask him for help. DO NOT TAKE HIM!!!!!

He is very respectful and easy going, but he expects respect back! Provides all Power Points on D2L and gives opportunities at the beg. of each class to answer questions from homework. He was helpful but I attended Stats tutoring the whole semester to get the A. If you have A avg in class at end of semester, you don't take final. Don't skip class.

Professor Mattle is amazing. He breaks everything down very simply so you understand. He is very organized. He posts all of his PowerPoints online along with reviews before the tests. He's funny and loves his job. He'll always answer questions. Grades are just homework and tests which he allows a cheat sheet in.

Really great professor! Lectures are clear and easy to understand. Power points are online. No need to come to class. You get use a notecard on every test. Just copy the formulas/ notes from PowerPoints to the notecard and you'll get an easy A. I used 2 notecards (Be sneaky w/ it). Final replaces lowest test grade if it's higher. Do the homework!

He's great. Lectures can be pretty dry but classes are short. There will be tons of homework, do it! You'll be surprised how much it'll matter in the end! His test are simple if you get the concept. It's clear that he wants his students to succeed! I like him .

I am horrible at math, I took stats twice, and I had to drop  because I failed all the test. This teacher is the best for Statistics. Test are easy, and most of them are multiple choice with a few fill in the blanks. I am terrible at math, but this teacher made it easy and fun. Excellent teacher.

I thought the class was easy. He is approachable and explains everything in a way that makes stats easy. You get a note card on each test and the test are not hard. Homework every section, but it does help your grade. His lectures can be long, but he does try to make them interesting.

Prof. Mattle is a fantastic stats teacher. There are homework assignments after each section, but you can try each question multiple times if you get it wrong, so it is an easy 100. There are 3 tests and they are all fairly easy. You also get to bring a notecard of info with you to use as well. You can also exempt the final if you have an A.

Mattle is one of the best teachers I have ever had in my career of schooling. He is crystal clear when explaining math and doesn't make you feel stupid when asking a question. Lectures are really short, and so is the homework. Tests are easy. He gives additional points to your overall grade just for missing one or less classes. Very helpful!!

This professor is great if you want to make a good grade. Homework is average 15 questions on MML so it doesn't take too long. No quizzes, only 3 tests and a final. Final is mandatory. You can also bring a note card for the tests which makes it better. He's the type of professor that just wants you to pass, he doesn't try to trick you.

He was a GREAT professor! He was VERY nice and clear with lectures.  I went to his office once and he was very willing to help. Gave HW online but it really helped me understand the material. The test we mult choice and fill in the blank but not too bad.  Show up and listen and you should be fine.  I was nervous taking this class but loved it!

he was very clear and through when it comes to explaining statistics.  Would definitely recommend.  he is available for help and responds quickly to emails and will go over any issues with connect math. u don't need the hardcopy of the book if u get the code with the e-text.

After reading all the reviews on here, I was excited to take this class, as I thought it wouldn't be too difficult. I am okay at math, but I have put extra time and effort in this class and I am still not doing well. The tests are tricky and much different then the homework assigned. He is a great teacher though and prepares great notes.

I am currently taking Mr. Mattle's class in the summer semester and I love this professor! I hate math and he explains and breaks everything down just so you can understand. The home-work online is a little tedious so don't wait till the night before to do. He allows you to exempt the final if you are happy with your overall progress.

Let me start by saying I am horrible at math so if I can get an A so can you! Mattle talks slowly and explains everything extensively which was great for me. Attendance is mandatory,  homework due every week, at the end of the semester he lets you decide if you want to exempt your final based on if you're satisfied with your grade. 2 Thumbs up!

Terrible at math and I still have done much better than i would ever expect myself to do in this class, great teacher- very helpful. Gives lots of homework on connect math but helps prepare you for tests. I would take him again

Absolutely hilarious. He cares a lot about students and wants you to do well. His tests are kind of tricky, but he lets you use a notecard on all of them. Homework is online, and he drops the lowest one. He also takes good homework grades and makes them quiz grades. If you get the chance, TAKE HIM!
He allows you to use a note card on your test, and adds 1.5 points if you miss 2 or less classes. Awesome, easy teacher.

Professor Mattle was really an amazing teacher. I do not think I would have done so well if I had a different teacher. I mean, this was Calculus, and any teacher who can teach it well is a great teacher. Would definately take again. Easy A, just study your practice exams and do your homework. Final was cumulative, took maybe 30 minutes. Take him!

His lectures can be long, but they are very clear and easy to understand. He assigns a lot of homework online, but he goes over it in class before it is due. Attendance is mandatory if you want to exempt the final, but he posts all of his lecture slides online with his additional written notes, so if you do miss it is no big deal. Really cool guy.
Great teacher.  Test are pretty easy since you can have  a notecard with anything on it.  He's also willing to help if you don't understand something.  Take him if you can.

He's kind of boring but it's a boring class. Very willing to help. All quizzes/homework online with unlimited tries. Tests aren't too hard and lets you use a notecard. Overall, easy class as long as you do the homework.

Professor Mattle was not a great professor. He taught straight from the textbook and taught our class the unnecessarily longer ways of solving problems. He treated our class like a high school class, for instance, by getting a substitute teacher. He has a routine and will not break it for any circumstance. I do not recommend him.

The class is boring, but Prof Mattle teaches the material well. He is willing to help his students. All the homework and quizzes were online. 4 tests with a note card as a cheat sheet. Class is not difficult as long as you go to class.

He's kind of boring, but stats is boring anyway. He's very helpful. A lot of homework which is all online. You can have a notecard full of notes to use for all the tests. If your attendance and grades are good then you can exempt the final!

Good professor. It can be kind of boring, but then it was stats. He's passionate about what he teaches and explains things in a way that's easier to grasp than the book. Good bit of homework (all online), but if you attend class it's pretty easy, plus there are examples/walkthroughs. You can have a cheat sheet for the tests.
